help:
The leader of the game will select an odd, unusual word from the dictionary. The goal is to select a word that no one has ever heard of before, and that the meaning would be really hard to guess. While the leader writes the correct definition, each player writes down a fake but credible definition for it. Next, the bot sends a poll with the shuffled definitions without specifying the author. The players have to vote on which one they think is the real definition.
Points:
 - players get %{guessPoints} pt. for guessing the correct definition, but if everyone guesses she gets %{everyoneGuessedPoints}
 - if everyone guesses correctly, the leader gets %{everyoneGuessedLeaderPoints} pt. 
 - otherwise she gets %{notEveryoneGuessedLeaderPoints} pt. 
 - furthermore, players get %{votePoints} pt. for every received vote 
Who gets most points wins!
